name: Glowble
description: Glowble is a website / app that democratises the scouting process for sportspeople all over the world and celebrates the social side of the clubs we love.

team.name: Gareth Nicholas
team.bioHtml: Ex- Yahoo marketer looking to create something cool of his own

jobs.title: Technical Co-Founder
jobs.description:
I need a Woz to my Steve. Preferably you will have an interest in sport and social networking and will be looking to create something great that can scale. 

Knowledge of full stack development needed including mobile and understanding of wider network infrastructure would be great.
